name: R\West
description:
Founded in 1997, R\West is an integrated full-service marketing agency with offices in Portland, Ore., San Francisco and New York. The agency specializes in regional and national advertising, creative design, interactive strategy and design, media planning and buying, social media, and public relations.Â 
Current clients include DeMarini Sports, Bonne Maman, SOREL, and FLIR Systems, Inc., among others.
